title: Why riot is gay
body:
Why is riot pairing bronze players with All plats and gold players?
Is this fair?
Is this fun for the community?
Especially when they have to be try hards and pick champs that are so strong when fed because they cant loose when they're plats and golds{{champion:17}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Sounds like someone lost a game. 

Waaah Waaah.
yeah dude that makes them... gay? kek
Nice job bronze who has no friends{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
